>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/settings/security/loginsettings"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates the login settings with the parameters specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"attemptCount":{"maximum":9999,"minimum":1,"type":"integer","description":"The maximum number of consecutive failed login attempts allowed before triggering account suspension.","format":"int32","example":1234},"blockTime":{"maximum":9999,"minimum":1,"type":"integer","description":"The duration (in minutes) for which an account remains suspended after exceeding maximum login attempts.","format":"int32","example":1234},"checkPeriod":{"maximum":9999,"minimum":1,"type":"integer","description":"The maximum time (in seconds) allowed for server to process and respond to login requests.","format":"int32","example":1234}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for configuring login security and performance settings.","title":"LoginSettingsRequestDto"}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Updated login settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"object","properties":{"attemptCount":{"type":"integer","description":"The maximum number of consecutive failed login attempts allowed before triggering account suspension.","format":"int32","example":1234},"blockTime":{"type":"integer","description":"The duration (in minutes) for which an account remains suspended after exceeding maximum login attempts.","format":"int32","example":1234},"checkPeriod":{"type":"integer","description":"The maximum time (in seconds) allowed for server to process and respond to login requests.","format":"int32","example":1234},"isDefault":{"type":"boolean","description":"Specifies if these settings are default or not","example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The login settings parameters.","title":"LoginSettingsDto"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"LoginSettingsWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
